definitions.definition: Of an object, reflecting light as if giving off tiny sparks or flashes of light.
Of a beverage , especially an alcoholic beverage, containing dissolved carbon dioxide (either naturally or that has been added) that comes out of solution in the form of many tiny bubbles .

main_definition: Of an object, reflecting light as if giving off tiny sparks or flashes of light.
secondary_definitions: Of a beverage , especially an alcoholic beverage, containing dissolved carbon dioxide (either naturally or that has been added) that comes out of solution in the form of many tiny bubbles .
